info.author: Christof Hoeke
info.description:
Builds upon Restserver but maybe it is useful for people writing S5
presentations. Currently no theme is selectable, should be easy to add though. 

The ZIP dist is complete with a the default theme and an example.
info.name: s5server
info.summary: A simple S5 presentations serving server using ReST source files
info.html_description:
Builds upon Restserver but maybe it is useful for people writing S5 presentations. Currently no theme is selectable, should be easy to add though.

The ZIP dist is complete with a the default theme and an example.
